name: Barbell Bench Press
how_to: Lie flat on a bench, grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width, lower the bar to your chest, and press it back up.

name: Dumbbell Bench Press
how_to: Lie flat on a bench, hold a dumbbell in each hand, lower the dumbbells to your chest, and press them back up.

name: Incline Barbell Press
how_to: Set the bench at an incline (about 30-45 degrees), grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width, lower the bar to your upper chest, and press it back up.

name: Incline Dumbbell Press
how_to: Set the bench at an incline (about 30-45 degrees), hold a dumbbell in each hand, lower the dumbbells to your upper chest, and press them back up.

name: Decline Barbell Press
how_to: Set the bench at a decline, grip the barbell slightly wider than shoulder-width, lower the bar to your lower chest, and press it back up.

name: Decline Dumbbell Press
how_to: Set the bench at a decline, hold a dumbbell in each hand, lower the dumbbells to your lower chest, and press them back up.

name: Cable Flyes
how_to: Set the pulleys at chest height, grab the handles, and bring them together in front of your chest with a slight bend in your elbows.

name: Pec Deck Machine
how_to: Sit on the machine, place your arms on the pads, and bring them together in front of your chest.

name: Dumbbell Flyes
how_to: Lie flat on a bench, hold a dumbbell in each hand, and with a slight bend in your elbows, lower the weights to the side and bring them back together above your chest.

name: Incline Dumbbell Flyes
how_to: Set the bench at an incline (about 30-45 degrees), hold a dumbbell in each hand, and with a slight bend in your elbows, lower the weights to the side and bring them back together above your chest.

name: Push-Ups
how_to: Place hands slightly wider than shoulder-width on the floor, lower your body until your chest nearly touches the ground, and push back up.

name: Weighted Dips
how_to: Use parallel bars, lean slightly forward, dip down until your shoulders are below your elbows, and push back up.

name: Smith Machine Bench Press
how_to: Perform a bench press using a Smith machine, which can help control the movement and focus on muscle contraction.

name: Landmine Press
how_to: Anchor one end of a barbell in a landmine attachment, hold the other end with one hand, and press upward.
